description:
Arch Linux is a powerful and flexible Linux distribution, loved by many for its simplicity and control. However, new users often find package management in Arch a bit challenging. In this guide, we’ll focus solely on pacman, Arch’s default package manager, and AUR (Arch User Repository) helpers, tools that make managing AUR packages easier.

The post Beginner’s Guide to Pacman and AUR Helpers on Arch Linux appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Beginner’s Guide to Pacman and AUR Helpers on Arch Linux

description:
Nextcloud has unveiled Nextcloud Talk, an open-source alternative to Microsoft Teams. It’s a privacy-compliant collaboration platform for hybrid teams that gives companies complete control over their data.

The post Nextcloud Talk: Open-source, GDPR-Compliant Alternative to Microsoft Teams appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Nextcloud Talk: Open-source, GDPR-Compliant Alternative to Microsoft Teams
